alert.note: Alert for Tavaputs Plateau (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 3:50PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Grand County through 430 PM MDT... At 350 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles southeast of Green River, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Grand County. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Utah between mile markers 164 and 191. U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 130 and 157. Utah 279 between mile markers 1 and 8, and mile marker 10 and near mile marker 15. Utah 313 between mile markers 6 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
